meanings.definition: Used to introduce a concession or acknowledgment.
meanings.sent1: Admittedly, I was wrong about the time of the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She is usually punctual, but admittedly, she was late today.
meanings.sent3: Admittedly, my cat thinks she's the boss of the house!
meanings.sent4: The sun, admittedly, does not revolve around the Earth.
meanings.sent5: Admittedly, accepting defeat gracefully is a sign of maturity.

meanings.sent1: He is admittedly the fastest runner on the team.
meanings.sent3: Admittedly, the dog's attempt at singing was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile, admittedly, lit up the entire room.
meanings.sent5: Admittedly, the view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.
